details.brokersummary:
Stunning 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath! WIll Private Outdoor space!
Highlights include:
Spacious Queen Bedrooms Expansive Living Area Large Windows for Ample Natural Light Contemporary Kitchen High Ceilings Hardwood Floors Dishwasher Don?t miss out on this fantastic opportunity! Contact us today to schedule a viewing!

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Gorgeous exposed brick. Heat & Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available 9/1 On-Site Super Small pets OK No broker fee

Incredible, newly renovated huge 1-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the subway in Prime Williamsburg! Right by the waterfront.
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light! Nice L-shaped living/dining area, creating 2 separate spaces.
- Big bedroom with closet - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave - Elevator building - On-Site Super
JMZ trains, Domino Park, Peter Luger's, Pies-N-Thighs, Social House Cafe, Deux Chats, Patrizia's of Williamsburg, etc nearby.
No broker fee Available 9/1 Small pets welcome

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat and hot Water is included. Could be used as a 1 bedroom --OR--- 1 bedroom + office ---OR--- 2 bedroom with small living area. The choice is yours!
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
Virtual tours available! Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more! Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
9/1 move in Small pets welcome

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive!
Don?t miss out on this gorgeous gut renovated 3 bedroom 1 bath apartment Spacious rooms! Hardwood Floors! Wood finishes! Stainless steel appliances And it?s located on a beautiful tree-lined block just around the corner from the Children?s Museum. Close to the A ,C, 3 trains at Nostrand Avenue for an express route to Manhattan! Heat and Hot water included!
NO FEE!

Nice 3 bed just 1 block from PROSPECT PARK!!
- Hardwood Floors Throughout - 3 Great Sized Bedrooms - Separate Living Room - Small Pets Welcome - Heat/Hot Water Included
You will not beat this apartment. The B/Q train is literally around the corner and so it PROSPECT PARK!! The neighborhood is so great with bars, grocery, and restaurants everywhere. These apartment don?t last long so take a look today.
Small pets OK Available now

SUNNY 1 bed / 1 bath in an elevator building. Facing the City and the building?s internal courtyard! Tons of natural light coming into all areas of the apt. New construction built into what used to be a school attached a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments.
This spacious 1br but has beautiful finishes and lots of natural light.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room Huge Roof deck Parking (based on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO BROKER FEE!! Just 1st and security to move in! Pets ok!
Contact us to set up a viewing right away!

SUNNY 2br / 1.5 bath DUPLEX with PRIVATE outdoor patio! Showing immediately! New construction built into what used to be a school attached to a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments! Wow. This is a one of a kind of apartment.
Video link is on StreetEasy. If you can?t see the video link , let me know and I?ll send it to you. Photos and video of actual apartment.
1br and full bath plus living room and kitchen upstairs PLUS extra ?rec? room and 1/2 bath downstairs. This works great for one person or a couple who want a lot of space but definitely fits 2 friends who want to be in this booming location in a luxury building with outdoor space for a great price.

2 Bed CORNER UNIT Penthouse with amazing views ready for immediate move in!
Please see video on StreetEasy ad or send message and I?ll send to you!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Vaulted ceiling Gas fireplace Top floor of elevator building. 2 elevator bays make sure you never have to wait! Corner apartment with TONs of natural light Kitchen island perfect for setting up stools for dining Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Efficient PTAC heat and cooling unit for all rooms Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets

Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Virtual Tour Available! Beautiful 1.5 BR/1bath apartment in fabulous Bushwick!This apartment is in the pindrop-quiet "rear" building of this unique courtyard complex! It's like your own little treehouse in the middle of Bushwick. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.No brokers fee!Only First & SecurityContact to schedule your appointment today!

2br / 1bath with laundry in the building and roof deck! Huge windows in the bedrooms (south facing) Cutout window to bring more light into the large living room Butcher block countertops Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Roof deck Laundry in the building Faces away from the street
NO fee Pets ok Just 1st and security to move in Call or text to see right away!

ONE-OF-A-KIND 1 bed / 1 bath TRIPLEX with large private roof terrace! TWENTY NINE FOOT HIGH ceilings with original brick detail throughout and the church?s original 120-year-old hand-painted tin ceiling!! Vaulted ceilings in this historic church building give it a large open feel. Must see in person to get the full size.
If you can?t see the video please let me know and I?ll text it to you
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Large private terrace Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Spacious bedrooms and living room Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Garage parking ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. There is an elevator to the roof shared roof deck but not to the apartment because there is no elevator in this part of the building. Up 2 flights. 4 laundry rooms , one on each floor.
Pets ok No fee . Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.
- dishwasher - central AC - laundry in unit
8/1 move in

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.
